item.title: MojaMoja
item.description: Yet another Perl MVC micro-framework with a name that will be confused with my wiki software. From the Author's description: (PoC)yet another sinatra-ish framework built on CPAN module. Rather than 'shaggadelic' or 'dance', this one starts the app with 'zigorou'. I can't see it catching on.
